item.title: Three Americans jailed over failed DR Congo coup returned home
item.description: Details of the repatriation are not known but it comes amid talks about a mineral deal between the two countries.

item.title: Ukraine captures two Chinese nationals fighting for Russia
item.description: President Zelensky says two soldiers were captured while fighting in Ukraine's Donetsk region.

item.title: China calls for world to unite against Trump's 'trade tyranny'
item.description: Manufacturers and exporters are scrambling after 104% levy on China-made goods comes into effect.

item.title: Nursing home fire in China kills 20 people
item.description: Authorities have detained the person in charge of the facility as they investigate the cause of the fire.

item.title: Trump's tariffs are a huge blow to Vietnam's economic ambitions
item.description: US exports have driven the economic success of countries like Vietnam and Cambodia.
